backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing Valentine flow navigation, GIF display updates, and strings module changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing high-level summaries for all frontend Valentine-related components and screens.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme colors, dark mode variables, and base animations.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and the root script for the Valentine app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the ValentineFlow controller.
frontend/src/features/valentine/componen: Autoplaying looped music player with manual play/pause toggle.
Displays animated falling-heart elements generated by a custom hook.
Reusable Back/Next navigation buttons driven by the flow order.
GIF component with error detection and a text-based fallback container.
Card-style layout wrapper providing centered content styling.
frontend/src/features/valentine/content/: Centralized asset paths for GIFs, images, and music.
Defines linear Valentine screen order and helpers for previous/next screen lookup.
Centralized user-facing text including navigation labels and GIF fallback strings.
frontend/src/features/valentine/effects/: React hook managing custom GIF URLs with validation, preview, persistence, and fallbacks.
Generates and manages timed falling heart animations with automatic cleanup.
frontend/src/features/valentine/screens/: Displays three gift options with a GIF and navigation controls.
Runs a multi‑question quiz with correct/wrong answer handling and navigation.
Shows a romantic message sequence with a GIF and navigation back to gifts.
Displays two memory images and a GIF with a button to return to gifts.
Success screen showing a celebration GIF and options to restart or revisit gifts.
Intro screen with welcome text, a GIF, and a button to begin the flow.
Asks the Valentine question, supports custom GIF selection via dialog, and handles yes/no actions.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Valentin: Controls screen navigation and renders the correct Valentine screen along with hearts and music.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity auth, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom color variables, theme styles, and Valentine-themed component classes and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, features, requirements, architecture notes, and version metadata.
